p: The HL-60 and HL-60R cell lines were incubated with the essential oil (25 Âµg/mL) for 24 h, and cell death was evaluated by flow cytometry analysis of DNA stained with propidium iodide. E. intisy EO caused a comparable marked block in the preG 0-G 1 position in both cell lines by preventing the entry of cells to G2/M ( Figure 3). These results confirm the interest in Euphorbia species as potential anticancer drugs [ 49].
